alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Graves; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:19AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Massac, southeastern Pope, south central Crittenden, southern Livingston, northwestern Marshall, southeastern McCracken, north central Graves and northwestern Lyon Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lone Oak, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Reidland around 225 AM CDT. Ledbetter around 230 AM CDT. Calvert City around 235 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Eddyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 6 and 43. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 50 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crittenden; Graves; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken
